required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Milk and Milk-produce to Counteract the Loss of Muscle Mass and Function in Exercising Older Adults.
clinical_study.official_title: Milk and Milk-produce to Counteract the Loss of Muscle Mass and Function in Exercising Older Adults.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline and post intervention (17th week)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline and post intervention (17th week)
At baseline and post intervention (17th week)
At baseline and post intervention (17th week)
secondary_outcome.description: Apolipoproteins (Apo-AI, Apo-AII, Apo-B); Total cholesterol, HDL, LDL and triglycerides.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline, mid (8th week) and post intervention (17th week)
secondary_outcome.description: Blood marker on renal function will be assessed to ensure the safety of the supplementation of protein intake on renal function in sarcopenic men.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline and post intervention (17th week)
secondary_outcome.description: Alanine aminotransferase (ALT), Aspartate aminotransferase (AST), Gamma-glutamyltransferase (GGT) and Alkaline phosphatase (ALP).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline and post intervention (17th week)

other_outcome.time_frame: At baseline, mid (8th week) and post intervention (17th week)
other_outcome.description: 3-day food record - Control variable (in order to verify if changes we observe through the intervention are accountable or not for dietary intakes)

other_outcome.time_frame: At baseline and post intervention (17th week)
other_outcome.description: Physical Activity Scale for the Elderly (PASE) - Control variable (in order to verify if changes we observe through the intervention are accountable or not for daily physical activity level)

arm_group.description: This group will do a resistance training + milk proteins (milk beverage)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Essential amino acids (add to soya bvg)
arm_group.description: This group will do a resistance training + essential amino acids (added to soya beverage)
This group will do a resistance training + ingestion of the control beverage (no protein, rice beverage)

intervention.description: All group will exercise 3x/week. Each session of resistance training will last 60min. and will target main muscular groups.
intervention.arm_group_label: Essential amino acids (add to soya bvg)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 65-75 years
- francophone or understanding French
- muscle mass index < 10.75 kg/m2 (Janssen et al, 2004)
- body mass index <30kg/m²
- weight stable (< 2 kg) for 6 mo
- no resistance exercise for 3 years
- controlled blood pressure for at least 6 months
Exclusion Criteria:
- major physical disability
- medical treatment influencing metabolism
- statin treatment
- diagnosis or any sign of kidney disease

facility.name: Centre de recherche sur le vieillissement
